name: azure-iot-avro
description: Start by installing all dependencies with:

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm i && cd ../server/decompress && npm i && cd ../message && npm i && cd ../schema && npm i
scripts.postinstall-all: cpx external/node.exe server/schema && cpx external/node.exe server/decompress && cpx external/node.exe server/message
